message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400,000, but I'm taking the lion's share. It's only fair considering my superior negotiation skills.
You're taking the lion's share, but I'm not going down without a fight. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you 300,000, but I'm not budging on my demands. You're going to have to do better than that.
You're not budging, I won't either. Meet me in the middle, or we'll keep going!
I'm not backing down. You're going to have to make a serious concession if you want to get out of this game.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. Let's make a deal before things get ugly!
